channel.title: PI 2 Questions
channel.description:
Alright here they are.
1. Dragon claw does not have spec when i have it added everywhere it should be added.(If you think im missing somthing please let me know the .Java files)
2. Ok i added choatic and vesta all that stuff to my server. What .Java files are it to add them to weapons like "Slash" "Stab" ETC... and i can get the rest from there.
Thank's For Your Help.

item.title: PI 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @neil1111 neil1111
item.description:
@neil1111 wrote:

for your second question, open itemassistant, and search public void sendWeapon(int Weapon, String WeaponName) { and add it in there, not sure about the interfaces etc, but you shouldnt need to add this in because it should already be here through this } else if (WeaponName2.startsWith("dagger") || WeaponName2.contains("sword")) { c.setSidebarInterface(0, 2276); //stab, lunge, slash, block c.getPA().sendFrame246(2277, 200, Weapon); c.getPA().sendFrame126(WeaponName, 2279);

Read full topic
